description.p: Returns an arc tangent angle (in radians) of two numbers.

prototypes.prototype: Atan2 as N (X as N, Y as N)

description.p: Returns the arc tangent angle (in radians) of two numbers.

discussion.p: The Atan2 function returns the arc tangent angle (in radians) of two numbers.

example.caption: Atan2() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 atan2(3,12) AS EXPR1 FROM Products = 0.244978663126864
